website_summaries.verdict: Stylish vessel faucet with a waterfall design that looks amazing.
pros: Available in either a brushed nickle or an oil rubbed bronze finish
Waterfall design creates an interesting look
Ships with all accessories you'll need for installation, including hot and cold flexible hoses
Good value considering the nice build quality

customer_reviews.title: Faucet is very sturdy and beautiful and looks lovely with my new sink
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a week before they said it would. Received text messages from shipper so I knew exactly when it was coming which was lovely as I had my contractor prepped for install. Faucet is very sturdy and beautiful and looks lovely with my new sink. Only thing is the left over water on the opening after water is turned off. U just wipe it off and it's not a deal breaker. I think you'll be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Check the finish before installing
customer_reviews.text: I love the style. It’s beautiful but something is happening to the finish. Right after we installed it I noticed a small spot of discoloring but I could deal with it. It’s only been installed for a month and the spot is getting larger. I’ve used nothing but water and my norwex cloth to clean it. Of course it’s too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sleek Waterfall Faucet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this faucet to go with the VCCUCINE Rectangle Above Counter Porcelain Ceramic Bathroom Vessel Vanity Sink Art Basin, that I bought as well. This faucet works great! If you do turn the faucet on super high, the water will bounce a bit off the back of the Sink, but other than that, it doesn't leak, works great and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Wenzel's Wayside

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic faucet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this faucet. I read all the reviews about the noise and the water pressure. All you do is turn the water supply off some to throttle the water and I enjoy the sound as it is after all a waterfall faucet. Hope the fixture lasts and looking forward to purchasing another one when I remodel the master bath as well.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin' Dan

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the Water !
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. This is for an above counter bowl sink. We replaced the faucet in our RV bowl sink because the reach was really short and water splashed everywhere. Not only does this put water in the middle of the bowl, it delivers volume! The amount of water that comes out it amazing. If only I had bowl sinks in the house, they would all have this faucet. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Finish is coming off
customer_reviews.text: I had not install this until March 2019 and the finish (brushed nickel) is coming off where the water pours. It looks white. It had good reviews, but this finish is wearing off in only a month and that should not happen. I have city water, nothing should be taking the finish off. It is past the time to return, but I am hoping still that the manufacturer will do something
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by price
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise! The quality of this faucet is amazing. Installation took 10 minutes. Having looked at similar units in the big box stores, I was prepared to spend 3 figures or so. This was a terrific unit, great quality and a wonderful price! More money doesn’t equal better quality sometimes, and this is one of those times.
customer_reviews.author: Fishingrodmaker

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The price was terrific, compared to other styles online and at box stores. We love the style, and even the 13-year-old thinks it's "cool." I chose this as it makes us think of the old farmhouse water pumps, in a way. We really like the way the water flows out from the open-top pipe / faucet.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Simple design and looks awesome, the flow of the water if you have it on full is too much for most sinks so you might want to control the flow underneath to adjust it so if you have someone who is not aware of this, it won't splash out of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Womack

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone installing country style wash basins
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I was looking for to finish the project I was working on.. it’s height easily cleared the wash basin sink I had installed on an old bureau to convert it into a rustic country bathroom piece. Installation was very easy.. Would recommend this piece for any utilizing wash basin style instillations. Only drawback was the base ring came separately so I had to wait one additional day for that component to arrive. Great product and timely service
customer_reviews.author: Billy Deatherage

customer_reviews.title: Quality, heavy faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy quality lever movement faucet. A faucet that you would expect to cost more, because of the sturdiness and smoothness of the fixture. It also has a hot and cold round indicator for visual guide. Water does tend to puddle in spout, quick wipe removes. In addition we have the water pressure lowered at valve to reduce excessive splash.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: These faucets are very well made, easy to install and they look terrific. Thanks for a great product. Steve Emerson
customer_reviews.author: James S. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for price
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has height too it. Good price. At Home Depot they have one similar but shorter and it is over $100
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was wanting!! The quality is awesome. The first one I got was missing the screw that holds it in place--but i called Amazon and they immediately replaced it with a new one. My bathroom came out exactly like I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the spigot...LOVED the price
customer_reviews.text: IT IS PERFECT ! SUPER EASY to install (we have it on a petrified wood vessel sink). We Read ALL the reviews; OTHER reviewers #1 complaint/worry was the wee bit of water that remains in the spigot....NO big deal, wipe off with a little toilet paper and it will never rust/corrode (DUH)...2nd reviewer complaint: Too much pressure; they said the water flowed OVER THE vessel...adjust the water flow on the lines....YET, another DUH !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and packaging was absolutely amazing. In regards to the product itself well all ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and packaging was absolutely amazing. In regards to the product itself well all I can say is that is works and looks great. Very solid construction and by its operation you can tell that is a very high quality. With that said for the price point this is a great buy for whomever is in the market for this product... 10 out of 10 Rich Maggs
customer_reviews.author: Richard Magniccari

customer_reviews.title: I extremely happy that I purchased these faucets
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Looks and feels expensive. I would have paid 3 times the amount at my local home improvement store. I am extremely happy that I purchased these faucets. They are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: p.cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! Color is great, works awesome and installation was a snap! But my husband is pretty handy so it came easy! Very happy with this purchase and the price was GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to the original piece it replaced from homedepo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Poor finish and inconsistent edges. Loud. Poorly positioned screen. As far as I can tell it's a sealed cartridge which makes it unrepairable if need be.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Sad story
customer_reviews.text: This facet is beautiful but it came missing a key component for installation and I don’t believe I can purchase that part. Therefore, it is useless, $70+ “down the drain”, because I missed the return window due to not opening the box right away (the project it was for was delayed).
customer_reviews.author: Amazinglove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but shows water spots
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of this faucet! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it shows water spots every time you use it. I wish it were sloped a little, so it would dry cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is fantastic! I couldn’t believe the price as these are two to three times the cost anywhere else. We love it! It’s my husband’s favorite upgrade in our house so far.
customer_reviews.author: Knoots

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily
customer_reviews.text: We had one of those automatic touch faucets that never worked right. This one works just fine. Good flow, easy installation. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet for a nice rustic look.
customer_reviews.text: Rustic looking, goes perfectly with vessel sink. Easy to install, comes with water hoses. Perfect height for sink I also purchased. Rubbed bronze coloring adds to its good looks.
customer_reviews.author: phillipa

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud Faucets
customer_reviews.text: The faucets look great in my bathroom. The only downside is they are super loud. So if you are trying to be quiet if someone is sleeping in your room the water noise will wake you up for sure. Other than that so far so good, but I would not recommend if you share a room with anyone and you have totally different schedules the noise will wake you up. I try to keep the water flow as low as possible to minimize the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful works beautifully, only thing at all negative would be if it gave a suggestion on how far to install from perhaps a vessel sink, wish we would have installed a bit closer, but were worried about splashing when it hit middle of sink. Closer would have been better...
customer_reviews.author: Rhea B

customer_reviews.title: Easy install...looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived next day, as promised. The faucet was very nice looking and easy to install. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Get a lot of complements on the new bath and the new fixtures. Really meets our decor
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Line
customer_reviews.text: Hose was attached for 2 weeks until the cold water hose broke. Ok for the price but would suggest buying extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Chad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better in person. I love it ,its a beautiful and high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, will update later.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of this, I can not comment on how it works yet because the sink I ordered (from another seller) came in cracked and I am still waiting for a replacement. I believe it will be great once I can install it.
customer_reviews.author: CTaylor

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I needed a very tall faucet due to the height of my vessel sink. It was easy to install, looks very expensive, and is solidly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: slshorts703

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality. Installed several months ago and have been very pleased. I love the design and funtionality. I have received numerous compliments. Installation was basic.
customer_reviews.author: Kyfarmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great waterfall pump look
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this faucet. Looks great in my antique themed bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Scaife

customer_reviews.title: TOP TIER PRODUCT FOR HALF THE COST!
customer_reviews.text: More than satisfied with this purchase! Fast delivery, easy install, came with everything you need for a perfect install, and half the cost of other places like lowes and home depot!
customer_reviews.author: ZoeyTree

customer_reviews.title: Issues are 1- water spots easy to develop 2- very loud when you open water
customer_reviews.text: It comes without drain. You have to buy the drain separately. Issues are 1- water spots easy to develop 2- very loud when you open water, you have to shut the inflow half way Looks great though
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this faucet. Looks great with the vessel sink and the antique sewing-machine-cabinet-turned vanity! Right height and depth for vessel!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works great
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed to finish my husband's man cave bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lou

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works as described and fits perfectly where I wanted it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McConnell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Finish is coming off on the handle and spout. The supply lines have a non standard connection which makes installation difficult
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Has been leaking through the spout since the day it ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been leaking through the spout since the day it was installed even when off. Tried to figure out the problem but the whole unit is sealed shut!
customer_reviews.author: Colby R.

customer_reviews.title: Finish coming off!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I purchased two of these a little over a year ago. The finish is coming off of both of them....Looks terrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Warren M.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looked great in the bathroom of our RV
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Work great for bowl sinks
customer_reviews.text: great looking, we actually installed this in our 5th wheel
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 100+ old home.
customer_reviews.text: Style will look right at home after remodel finished. Rating is because the faucet has not yet been installed. Will update rating when completed.

customer_reviews.title: cute for our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet. The only issue is finding something to clean it.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Still in shock of how good of quality this is when lowes sells them for $300

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, unique
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty, well made, exactly what I had in mind

customer_reviews.title: it worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: great fit, works wonderfully. however, I'm not sure how to clean the automizer when it will be time to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Randy SMith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just be careful not to turn on full force, water goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: love15122

customer_reviews.title: Eye-catcher!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our new waterfall faucet looks beautiful in the newly renovated guest bathroom. It truly compliments the vessel sink. This is a great item for the price. It was a fraction of the cost from the local vendor. It also comes with the necessary hardware to connect the hot/cold water. Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: R2C2USA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet at great price.
customer_reviews.text: very pleased - much more expensive looking than price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very comparable to more expensive brands. Has been working flawlessly and the finish is still in great shape.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It fits perfectly in its spot
customer_reviews.text: Love it . It fits perfectly in its spot . My concern was it wouldn't be tall enough but it works great

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This worked as well as the more expensive faucets at a fraction of the cost.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the $200 Menards vessel sink faucet we have
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the $200 Menards vessel sink faucet we have. This faucet even impressed the kids. I normally don't leave feedback but this faucet is amazing and super affordable and very easy to install. The only downside is it doesn't include the drain but at this price it hardly makes any difference. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Phillips

customer_reviews.text: I dont write many reviews but this is a well made faucet for fair price

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this faucet. It’s perfect for the farmhouse look I was going for. This price is unbelievable! Buy this faucet. There is a little more Noise with this faucet than my previous one but doesn’t bother me in the slightest.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping great quality. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm impressed with the quality of this faucet. Looks and feels great.

customer_reviews.title: Does not shut off properly.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet has been dripping for hours after being shut off. One use, installed today. Any suggestions?

customer_reviews.title: Love the faucet!!!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice and works great. Easy to install. Everyone loves it.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this faucet to someone who is looking for great ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty quality, I would definitely recommend this faucet to someone who is looking for great quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: A J  DeMar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful and goes well with a vessel sink.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Single handedly the best Faucet we have yet to use! Smooth transition and lush water flow. Install was tight but rock solid once installed. Would recommend this to everyone. Similar faucets at Lowes or home depot are around $ 500. Worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised

customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly,easy to install,regulated water pressure with supply valves,in service for about 2 weeks,style we where looking for works great!

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful faucet, but I’m still trying to install it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful faucet, but I’m still trying to install it in my concrete counter. The hot and cold water cables are too short for what I need and the anchor bolt and flange are too short as well. Don’t go to your local hardware store for a fix because it’s so specialized to this faucet you can’t get anything to adapt it. But I contacted the company and they shipped me a new one out at no charge!! Lots of pressure and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulmind

customer_reviews.title: Only problem with my water, I must wipe it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with my water, I must wipe it out or I have the white water line where it enters the spout, as water stays in that immediate area.

product_meta.title: BWE Vessel Sink Faucet with Supply Line Lead-free Brushed Nickel Deck Mount One Hole Single Handle Waterfall Bathroom Faucets Lavatory Mixer Tap Tall Body
feature_bullets: Solid brass construction ensures quality and reliability
Designed to fit 1 or 3-hole configurations. An optional deck plate is included for 3-hole installation.
Single-handle bathroom faucet for easy adjustments to a powerful Waterfall stream
Modern waterfall faucet for bathroom sink
Pop Up Drain and lift rod are NOT included
